title: Scientists Have Created A New Covid Strain With An 80% Kill Rate…What Could Go Wrong? 👀
cleaned_text:
Scientists have created a new Covid-19(84) strain that has an 80% kill rate, they did this by using gain of function research, a highly controversial practice of studying pathogens that can increase their lethality.

While mad scientists are creating the next global pandemic in a lab the Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is threatening to bring all the restrictions back if vaccine uptake doesn’t increase!

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the latest Covid-19(84) news where it is no longer a “conspiracy theory” that lab created viruses have the potential for global catastrophes.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
